description: Making fresh tracks? This hybrid hooded jacket will keep you comfortable with warm Thermarator™ Insulation, a thermal-reflective lining that holds in heat, and a durable shell.
name: Columbia Sportswear Powder Lite Hybrid Jacket - Mens
